email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Verify Your Netflix Billing Information

Dear valued Netflix member,

We are reaching out to inform you that there is an issue with your billing information on file. In order to avoid any interruption to your Netflix service, we kindly ask you to verify and update your billing details as soon as possible.

To verify your billing information, please click on the following link: [Phishing link]

Please note that failure to update your billing information may result in a temporary suspension of your Netflix account. We understand the importance of uninterrupted access to your favorite shows and movies, and we want to ensure that you continue to enjoy our service without any disruptions.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team.

Sincerely,
The Netflix Team
